website_summaries.verdict: Players who have tried composite bats may be pleasantly surprised at the performance of this single piece aluminum bat from Marucci. We like the weight and the balance.
pros: Balanced feel with a good grip
Minimal vibration for an aluminum model
cons: May not be a true Cat 7 model

customer_reviews.title: Best BBCOR bat we have tried - hot out of the wrapper and huge sweet spot.
customer_reviews.text: My son just moved up to HS baseball and had tried a few BBCOR bats and they all felt relatively dead compared to his old -5 USSSA stamped bat. When we tried this, he fell in love with the bat. Very hot out of the wrapper. Also nice here in Illinois where it can get cold in the spring and full composite bats are not an option. Even in warmer weather we have not found a composite to come close. Simply the best bat he has tried at this level.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great price great bat
customer_reviews.text: For $160 last year model bat you CAN'T beat this. Cat8 is really not that much different other than it's 3 times the price. My son is a freshmen and he loves this bat. Likes the feel on contact and satisfied with results he's getting. He carries a Dimarini 31" for fast pitchers and the Cat7 at 33" for more power/distance. No need to drop $400 on a bat when last year models are outstanding still...
customer_reviews.author: Jay Pompano

customer_reviews.title: Great bat that won’t break the bank
customer_reviews.text: My son is in high school and has hit with many bats. He is a contact hitter more than a power hitter. He has liked many bats he has hit with. For the cost vs advantages this is his favorite bat. Gives him extra pop and he likes the single piece over multi piece composite bats. He has hit with the cat 8 and said the only noticeable difference was some slightly better vibration suppression on the cat 8. His words, “not enough to justify the cost.”
customer_reviews.author: Bor Ua

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This bat is great. I have a 15yr old who is about medium height and 100 lbs and he can handle this bat fine. Switched from an old 32” drop 3 two piece bat because he was getting jammed a lot and it had a rubbber ring. Ball would his rubber ring and not go very far. With this new Cat7 BBCOR the ball has excellent pop even when he gets jammed above the handle. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LUIS G

customer_reviews.title: Top value bat!
customer_reviews.text: Best pop for your buck...balanced, single piece bat that's durable and can compete with any $450 bat out of the wrapper!
customer_reviews.author: Kinzo

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great bat for my 14 year old son. I have to say it has helped his batting and distance hitting. It has a nice ring to it when he hits the ball. Overall, a good value relative to more expensive and newer models.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yo son, a contact hitter, has LOVED this bat. He's 5'9" and 135 lbs and handles the bat very well. Lots of pop, well balanced and the grip is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Mcneese

customer_reviews.title: Nice pop with ball contact
customer_reviews.text: Great bat. Get any decent barrel on the ball and it will travel Nice ping sound off the bat. My son who plays HS Baseball loves this bat. Also recommend the LS 900 series
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat
customer_reviews.text: Love this bat. Nice sweet spot. Cheaper than was in any of the local sporting stores and through Marucci. He plays Babe Ruth and Travel Ball. Half the kids in his team have this bat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AuNaturel1

customer_reviews.title: Great bat
customer_reviews.text: 14U baseball. Love this bat. Read all reviews and bought it. My son hits great with it and has improved the length of his hits!
customer_reviews.author: Christianchic

customer_reviews.title: Batter up!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! My 13 y.o. loves and it and he’ll be able to use in high school. Nice price too!
customer_reviews.author: BPortman

customer_reviews.title: Love bat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 14 year old son to use in high school. He loves this bat.
customer_reviews.author: Alton G.

customer_reviews.title: Great bat. Definitely reduces ring.
customer_reviews.text: I know people say not to use nice bats at the cages but I use this bat because after 300 swings or so, that ring dampening makes a hell of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Dinger Bat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who plays on his high school team. He likes it a lot and says it has a big sweet spot and good barrel. This is a very high quality bat.
customer_reviews.author: ac4529

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this bat
customer_reviews.text: This bat was half the price than at a used baseball store. My son loves it and he has been hitting better.
customer_reviews.author: Tclappe

customer_reviews.title: Terrific straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought 32 " cat 7 for my 13yr old son. It had a pop straight out of the box. At practice he hit one homer and two into the fence. Probably phsycological as the bat looks good and has a more balanced feel about it. Never used one before and would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Go the Nelson Heat

customer_reviews.title: Bat bats balls
customer_reviews.text: Its a bat, it hits balls. I'll leave all this subjectivity about "pop" out of it. Nice grip. Grip swells at the knob a bit so if that isnt your thing, keep moving along.
customer_reviews.author: Backcountry

customer_reviews.title: He was disappointed about that but loves the balanced swing of the ...
customer_reviews.text: My high school son loves this bat. He had the Cat 6 last year. Our only complaint is they did nothing to improve the quality of the paint on the bat. It chipped the first time he used it. He was disappointed about that but loves the balanced swing of the bat and the overall feel.
customer_reviews.author: FallBoots

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bat!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bat. He just moved up the ranks and had to purchase a new bat. After all his research, he settled on this one. He says it's perfectly balanced and he has been getting hit after hit.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Sabovic

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat!
customer_reviews.text: Great bat at a great price (when I purchased). Really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boom!  Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pop out of the wrapper. All the girls like the boys that hit the CATs. Actually I don’t really know that for sure but my son does swing this bat well
customer_reviews.author: Bad bitch

customer_reviews.title: Great High School Bat
customer_reviews.text: Quickly loved by our high school team. Many are using it, so I may buy an extra for later. Bought this for my freshman, serious pop. The boys are sending balls to the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great pop off the bat, doubles are now triples to the fence
customer_reviews.author: DENISE S.

customer_reviews.title: The grip is great. This bat is loud
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son, he's a sophomore and he loves it and so does everybody else on the team. The grip is great. This bat is loud! Inside pitches that used to barely jam him is not a problem anymore. The exit velocity of the baseball off this bat is a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bat out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bat on the market. Tried the whole composite thing but this one piece bat is going to be very hard to bet we will be buying another when the time comes
customer_reviews.author: scott stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great bat great  price
customer_reviews.text: The best bat for very strong kids very durable and arrived quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat
customer_reviews.text: Teen review is that bat is nice and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mort

customer_reviews.title: Great bat for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We got this bat for our 14 year old son because he is going to play high school baseball. It took a little time to get used to it. He loves it now. He is hitting well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Boyle

customer_reviews.title: The bat is just as it is described it works great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: CHUCK KINKELAR

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this baseball bat proved to be good at my match, does not slip and the paint did not get down
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bat good power nothing wrong with the bat but the sticker on the knob of the bat came off but other than that it is very good. Highly recommend getting it
customer_reviews.author: james krauss

customer_reviews.title: This bat exceeds what I thought it was capable of doing and my son is very pleased and so am
customer_reviews.text: The bat came sooner than expected but the whole reason was to give more confidence to the batter. This bat exceeds what I thought it was capable of doing and my son is very pleased and so am I
customer_reviews.author: Kevin OSullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great pop
customer_reviews.text: Working great for high school ball. Works well in the cold, early spring instead of a composite bat!
customer_reviews.author: CKS631

customer_reviews.title: A good bat
customer_reviews.text: My grandson asked for this to use during his baseball days in middle school. It is a great bat, I have swung it myself the weight is proportioned very well.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bat for our son and he loves it. It has a great grip and fit our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Batters up
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it! He's gotten several doubles triples rbi on a sr field. Balanced good and pop right out of the wrapper. I highly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Germann

customer_reviews.title: Great Bat
customer_reviews.text: Bat sounds great and feels great. Good sweet spot . Gets used quite a bit by everyone. Son was the top offensive player on his middle school team .Will buy again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great bat!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality and value of this bat. My sons plays college ball and has had great success using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Tomasino

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have one extremely happy 13 year old ! The bat had performed as advertised and his confidence level is way up !
customer_reviews.author: Paul Carroll

customer_reviews.title: CAT 7
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 17 year old HS Jr son. Has great pop - like the CAT 6. MUCH BETTER than other BBCOR bats out there.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Norman

customer_reviews.title: Great college level bat with a huge sweet spot and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quickly became the bat my team asked to use for their at bats. Great college level bat with a huge sweet spot and good pop
customer_reviews.author: Bryce R. Dressler

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bat
customer_reviews.text: Great bat, tons of pop. We've always used Easton bats (which are great) but you really can't beat the price vs performance of the Marucci.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My son plays travel ball and loves this bat. Great pop
customer_reviews.author: brandy k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent Christmas gift for my son and went on sale right before I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Phifer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel and pop
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it...took him right to the batting cage where he was hitting bombs...most importantly no hand sting..
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I got it on time . It’s very good product
customer_reviews.author: Chris blessed

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we wanted shipping on point would recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: raymond schnars, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Less pop
customer_reviews.text: Composite bats have more pop I guess I was expecting more
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I feel like no matter where you hit its flying off
customer_reviews.text: Wow... I had no idea what I was missing. I was swinging a $60 BBCOR TPX bat before and this just completely blows it away. Balls just pop right off this bat. I feel like no matter where you hit its flying off. The bat just feels great in your hands. Pros: Sweet spot is huge, very well balanced, feels lighter yet weighs same. Cons: Obnoxiously loud ping sound, grip feels great but will come apart in no time (nothing you can't replace with some lizard skin)
customer_reviews.author: wbish

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bat
customer_reviews.text: This bat feels great in the hands of a 13 year old and has a lot of pop
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Tan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome bat right out of package. Well balanced bat with a lot of pop.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Buscemi

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bat for a single piece aluminum. It has nice pop and almost no vibration for a single price aluminum. It is a team favorite and my son has hit many line drives.
customer_reviews.author: Jesenia Coscuna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bat
customer_reviews.text: So far, my son is very happy with the balance and pop of his Marucci Cat7. Season has just started, we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the pop.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the pop. I read on it I've seen it in action in many games the performance I see when is being used is very poor
customer_reviews.author: Ruben f Durazo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For balanced hitters it is the hottest bat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new bat! It has a lot of pop!
customer_reviews.author: James Wingate

customer_reviews.title: Right On!!!
customer_reviews.text: The right bat for the right kid at the right time.
customer_reviews.author: A Mazon User

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this bat
customer_reviews.text: 2 1/2 months after we received it the bat broke during batting practice. It broke at the handle. My son even hit the ball clean. Do not purchase this bat.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget R.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them adding in the taxes after I made the ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like them adding in the taxes after I made the order could've went to my local sporting goods store and got it cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The year before I had this bat my average was .159 with 9 RBI’s and 0 HR the year I had this bat my average was .390 35 RBI’s 9 HR.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bat! Bought this for my 13 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bat! Bought this for my 13 year old son and he loves it. All the kids on his team want to use it. Very nice grip. Fast shipping. It was delivered before expected delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Marucci MCBC7 Cat7 BBCOR Baseball Bat
product_meta.description: Upgraded with the new az4x alloy, the strongest alloy in the Marucci arsenal, and a sweet spot twice as large as its predecessor, the Cat7 is built to explode with unrelenting Fury. The precision-balanced barrel and one-piece alloy design offer a clean, consistent swing to control the wrath of this ultra-responsive rainmaker.
feature_bullets: Commitment to quality and understanding of players'
Designed with the player in mind
Used by the best in the leauge
